channel.title: Getting Started on Liberty University Cyber Defense Club
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Liberty University Cyber Defense Club

item.title: Linux
item.description: What is Linux? Linux is an open-source operating system that is essential to know about in the cybersecurity world. There are many versions of Linux that are available which all have their own unique features that differentiate them. This portion of the guide will provide resources for making a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) as well as resources for learning more about the operating system. For the purposes of the club and this guide, Kali Linux will be used.

item.title: Windows
item.description: What is Windows? Microsoft Windows is the operating system that most of you are probably the most comfortable using. However, Windows has several powerful tools and services that you might not have ever heard about. This portion of the guide provides resources to learning basic PowerShell commands and a brief look at Active Directory. PowerShell Under the Wire Interactive way to learn PowerShell commands Active Directory
